The Horsman Lab Exploring microbial chemistry

Welcome Milad Iranshahy!

16 Feb 2023

Milad is a fantastic natural products chemist joining us from Iran and we are very lucky to have him! Milad will be working on our NFRF-funded project looking into the capacity of viruses to encode natural products. Exciting times!
